heading: This Afternoon
text: Mostly cloudy. Showers likely, except a more steady rain lifting through New Hampshire and northern Vermont early. Chance of a thunderstorm, mainly southwest. Highs in the low to mid 60s. Southeast winds 5 to 15, gusting to 25 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Mostly cloudy. Showers diminishing in the south, while remaining likely north. Lows in the mid to upper 40s. Winds becoming south to southwest 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Tuesday
text: Clouds decreasing south in the morning. Chance of a morning shower north, then clouds decreasing after noon, decreasing slowly northeast. Highs in the low to mid 60s in the south, and upper 50s to lower 60s north. Southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
